title: Dr Soraka
body: It just seems so right or nurse sona. Akali is just an assassin nothing to do with a nurse.

replies.body: TBH Dr Soraka, M.D. would be funny. Give her one of those oversized headbands with the metal disc on it, make her meteorite become a vitamin pill and the ult like a heartbeat sensor coming down from above.
how about a cheer leader soraka

> Akali is just an assassin nothing to do with a nurse.

So? Skins don't always have to do with anything related to the champion.
yes, like cupid Varus or what ever, he wants revenge... not love.
lol idc i just want a dr soraka
